description.lang: The WS15Z5-1 is a Smart in-wall switch designed providing the ideal mood for every situation forthe entire home. Not only can this switch control the connected load, with Central Scene support it can run up to 8 scenes created by the Hub, making the familiar light switch the most versatile Home Automation light switch available. It can essentially control lights and devices throughout the entire home.With Over The Air upgrading supported, this device can be seamlessly updated to the most recent firmware and software features.Finally, as a Z-Wave plus product, its 30% longer range is ideal for easily creating a strong Z-Wave mesh network for an easier installation and more reliable operation.
The LED Night Light on the WS15Z5-1 will turn OFF when the load attached isturned ON.To make the LED turn ON when the load attached is turned ON.

0 - LED OFF when the load is on, and ON when the load is off.1 - LED ON when the load is on, and OFF when the load is off.2 - LED is always on.3 - LED is always off.4 - LED blinks during RF transmissions from or to the device.
To change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom of the switch ON.
0 - Top of switch is ON, bottom of switch is OFF.1 - Bottom of switch is ON, top of switch is OFF
